name: Fireball
description: Deals 9 fire damage to units in a 2 tile burst.

chaos: Fireball randomly deals [physical], [lightning], or [fire] damage.  If a unit is resistant to one or more of these damage types, fireball deals the damage type that unit is least resistant to.
energy: Fireball randomly deals [arcane], [holy], or [fire] damage.  If a unit is resistant to one or more of these damage types, fireball deals the damage type that unit is least resistant to.
ash:
Fireball randomly deals [poison], [dark], or [fire] damage.  If a unit is resistant to one or more of these damage types, fireball deals the damage type that unit is least resistant to.
Fireball blinds for 1 turn.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Deals 12 lightning damage in a beam.

channel: Lightning bolt can be channeled for up to 10 turns.
judgement: Lightning bolt also deals holy and dark damage
energy: Lightning bolt also deals fire and arcane damage

name: Annihilate
description: Deals 16 fire damage, 16 lightning damage, and 16 physical damage to the target.

cascade_range: Hits from Annihilate will jump to nearby targets if the main target is killed
dark: Annihilate deals an additional dark damage hit
arcane: Annihilate deals an additional arcane damage hit

name: Lightning Form
description:
Whenever you cast a lightning spell, teleport to that spell's target.
Gain 100 lightning resistance.
Gain 100 physical resistance.
This effect ends the first turn that you fail to cast a lightning spell.

name: Mega Annihilate
description: Deals 99 fire damage, 99 lightning damage, and 99 physical damage to the target.

cascade_range: Hits from Annihilate will jump to nearby targets if the main target is killed
dark: Annihilate deals an additional dark damage hit
arcane: Annihilate deals an additional arcane damage hit

name: Teleport
description: Teleport to target tile

void_teleport: Teleport deals arcane damage to all enemy units in line of sight of the targeted tile equal to its maximum number of charges.

name: Blink
description: Teleport to target tile

requires_los: Blink can be cast without line of sight
lightning_blink: Blink deals lightning damage in a 3 tile burst upon arrival.  The damage is equal to twice the distance travelled, rounded up.
dark_blink: Blink deals dark damage in a 3 tile burst upon arrival.  The damage is equal to twice the distance travelled, rounded up.

name: Void Beam
description: Deal 25 arcane damage and destroy walls in a beam.

name: Thunder Strike
description:
Deal 24 lightning damage to the target.
Stun all enemies in a 2 tile burst around the target.

requires_los: Thunderstrike can be cast without line of sight
storm_power: Radius and stun duration are doubled if the target is inside of a storm cloud.
heaven_strike: Thunder Strike also deals holy damage

name: Chaos Barrage
description:
Fire 8 bolts of chaotic energy at random units in a cone.
Each bolt randomly deals 9 fire, 9 lightning, or 9 physical damage.

name: Disperse
description:
Teleport all units in a 3 tile radius to random locations
The caster is unaffected.

name: Petrify
description:
Inflict petrify on the target for 10 turns.
Petrified units cannot act.
Petrified units gain 100 ice resist.
Petrified units gain 100 lightning resist.
Petrified units gain 75 physical resist.
Petrified units gain 75 fire resist.

glassify: Turn the target to glass instead of stone.  Glass targets have -100 physical resist.

name: Wolf
description:
Summon a wolf.
The wolf has 11 HP.
The wolf has a melee attack which deals 5 physical damage.

leap_range: Summoned wolves gain a leap attack
blood_hound: Summon blood hounds instead of wolves.
ice_hound: Summon ice hounds instead of wolves.
clay_hound: Summon clay hounds instead of wolves.
wolf_pack: Each cast of wolf consumes 2 charges and summons 4 wolves.

name: Giant Bear
description:
Summon a giant bear.
The bear has 65 HP.
The bear has a melee attack which deals 10 physical damage.

armored: Summons an armored bear instead of a giant bear.  Armored bears have increased physical resistance and HP, but are vulnerable to lightning damage.
venom: Summons a venom bear instead of a giant bear.  Venom Bears have a poison bite, and heal whenever an enemy takes poison damage.
blood: Summons a blood bear instead of a giant bear.  Blood bears are resistant to dark damage, and deal increasing damage with each attack.

name: Sight of Blood
description:
Must target a damaged living unit.
The target is stunned for 4 turns.
Stunned units cannot act.
All living units in line of sight of the target go berserk for 4 turns.
Berserk units are hostile to all other units.  They will attack and be attacked by their allies.

requires_los: Sight of Blood can be cast without line of sight

name: Lightning Storm
description:
Create a thunderstorm with a 4 tile radius.
Each turn, each tile in the storm has a 50% chance of taking 12 lightning damage.
The storm lasts for 10 turns.

requires_los: Lightning Storm can be cast without line of sight

name: Prison of Thorns
description:
Surround a group of enemies with carnivorous plants.
The plants have 7 HP and cannot move.
The plants have a melee attack which deals 3 physical damage.
The plants vanish after 15 turns.

iron: Summon iron thorns instead, which deal 3 more damage and are resistant to many forms of damage.
icy: Summon icy thorns instead, which have a ranged ice attack.

name: Pillar of Fire
description:
Deal 50 fire in a 1 tile burst.
Deal double damage to the center tile.

channel: Pillar of Flame becomes a channeled spell

name: Boiling Blood
description:
All allied units gain 6 damage to their fire and physical abilities.
Lasts 7 turns.

holy_fury: Boiling Blood also impacts holy abilities
dark_fury: Boiling Blood also impacts dark abilities

name: Healing Light
description: Heal all allies in line of sight for 25 health.

shields: Allies in line of sight gain 1 shield

name: Regeneration Aura
description: Each turn for 8 turns, all allied units in a 10 tile radius are healed for 4 HP.

whole_map: The aura heals all allies on the level

name: Void Orb
description:
Summon a void orb next to the caster.
The orb melts through walls along the way, and deals 9 arcane damage each turn to all adjacent units.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by arcane damage.

fire_edge: Void orb deals an additional layer of fire damage
orb_walk: Targeting an existing void orb with another detonates it, and then teleports you to that location.

name: Dominate
description: Target enemy unit with 40 HP or lower becomes your minion.

hp_threshold: Increase the maximum HP units which can be targeted
check_cur_hp: Dominate targets based on current hp instead of maximum hp.

name: Flame Gate
description:
Whenever you cast a fire spell, summon a fire elemental at the target of that spell.
Fire elementals have 22 HP, 100 fire resist, 50 physical resist, and -50 ice resist.
Fire elementals have an attack which deals 7 fire damage with a 4 tile range.
Fire elementals vanish after 9 turns.
This effect lasts until you fail to cast a fire spell.

name: Eye of Fire
description:
Every 3 turns, deals 15 fire damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts 30 turns.

name: Eye of Lightning
description:
Every 3 turns, deals 15 lightning damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts 30 turns.

name: Eye of Ice
description:
Every 3 turns, deals 15 ice damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts 30 turns.

name: Nightmare Aura
description:
Each turn, randomly deals 2 arcane or 2 dark damage to each enemy in a 7 tile radius.
This damage is fixed, and cannot be increased using shrines, skills, or buffs.
Lasts 30 turns.

dark_dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Ravens, Werewolves, and Old Witches based on the total damage dealt by the spell.
electric_dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Spark Spirits, Thunderbirds, and Aelves based on the total damage dealt by the spell.
fever_dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Fire Lizards, Fire Spirits, and Flame Rifts based on the total damage dealt by the spell.

name: Basilisk Armor
description:
Whenever an enemy unit targets you with a spell or attack, that unit is petrified for 2 turns.
Lasts 10 turns.

name: Watcher Form
description:
Each turn, fire a lightning bolt at the farthest enemy in line of sight dealing 40 lightning damage in a beam.
You cannot move or cast spells.
Gain 100 physical resist.
Gain 100 fire resist.
Gain 100 lightning resist.
Gain 100 poison resist.
Lasts 5 turns

name: Imp Swarm
description:
Each turn, summon 2 imps near the caster.
Imps have 5 HP and can fly.
Imps have a ranged attack dealing 4 damage with a 3 tile range.
Each imp is either a fire, iron, or spark imp.
The imps each last 11 turns, and this effect lasts 5 turns.

metalswarm: Imp swarm summons copper imps instead of spark imps, and furnace imps instead of fire imps.
darkswarm: Imp swarm summons rot imps, void imps, and insanity imps instead of fire, spark, and iron imps.
megaswarm: Imp swarm summons giant imps instead of normal sized ones

name: Lightning Halo
description:
Deal 15 lightning damage to all units in a 3 tile ring each turn.
Lasts 9 turns.

name: Mystic Vision
description:
All other spells gain 5 range.
Lasts 8 turns.

aura: Mystic vision affects all allied units

name: Mystic Power
description:
All other spells gain 7 damage.
Lasts 8 turns.

bonus: Mystic Power's damage bonus is increased by 4
stackable: Mystic Power stacks in intensity instead of duration

name: Flame Burst
description: Deal 35 fire damage in a 6 tile burst around the caster.

meltflame: Melt walls adjacent to the blast
dawnflame: Flame Burst deals [holy] instead of [fire], and shields allied units instead of damaging them.
spreadflame:
Each cast of flame burst consumes all remaining charges.
For each charge consumed, flame burst gets +1 radius and +1 damage.
Slain enemies create additional explosions with half radius and damage.

name: Fire Drake
description:
Summon a Fire Drake at target square.
Fire Drakes have 45 HP, fly, and have 100 fire resist.
Fire Drakes have a breath weapon which deals 9 fire damage.
Fire Drakes have a melee attack which deals 8 physical damage.

dragon_mage:
Summoned Fire Drakes can cast Fireball with a 3 turn cooldown.
This Fireball gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Storm Drake
description:
Summon a storm drake at target square.
Storm drakes have 45 HP, fly, and have 100 lightning resist.
Storm drakes have a breath weapon which creates storm clouds that deal 10 lightning damage.
Storm drakes have a melee attack which deals 8 physical damage.

minion_physical_resist: Summoned Storm Drakes have 75% physical resist.
drake_swap: Whenever you target a summoned Storm Drake with a lightning spell, swap places with it.
dragon_mage:
Summoned Storm Drakes can cast Lightning Bolt with a 3 turn cooldown.
This Lightning Bolt gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Void Drake
description:
Summon a Void Drake at target square.
Void Drakes have 45 HP, fly, and have 100 arcane resist.
Void Drakes have a breath weapon which deals 8 arcane damage and melts walls.
Void Drakes have a melee attack which deals 8 physical damage.

dragon_mage:
Summoned Void Drakes can cast Magic Missile with a 3 turn cooldown.
This Magic Missile gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.
essence_drake: Whenever a summoned Void Drake kills an enemy unit, a random temporary ally gains +4 turns to its duration.

name: Ice Drake
description:
Summon an Ice Drake at target square.
Ice Drakes have 45 HP, fly, and have 100 ice resist.
Ice Drakes have a breath weapon which deals 8 ice damage and freezes units.
Ice Drakes have a melee attack which deals 8 physical damage.

dragon_mage:
Summoned Ice Drakes can cast Death Chill with an 8 turn cooldown.
This Death Chill gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
Fire an arcing bolt of electricity dealing 8 lightning damage.
The bolt repeatably arcs to new targets within the cascade range.
Each arc deals damage to all units along a beam.
The bolt can arc up to 4 tiles, and cannot pass through walls.
The bolt terminates when it cannot arc to any new targets.

weathercraft: Chain Lightning can arc to blizzards and storm clouds
shield:
Chain Lightning can arc to friendly targets.
Friendly units hit by Chain Lightning gain 1 SH, up to a max of 3, instead of damaged.

name: Death Bolt
description:
Deals 9 dark damage to one target.
Slain living units are raised as skeletons.
Raised skeletons have max HP equal to that of the slain unit, and deal 5 physical damage in melee.
Skeletons of flying units can fly.

wither: Non living units damaged by Death Bolt lose max hp equal to the damage dealt.
soulbattery: Deathbolt permenantly gains 1 damage whenever it slays a living target.

name: Touch of Death
description: Deal 200 dark damage to one unit in melee range.

raise_raven: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raised as a friendly Raven.
raise_vampire: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raised as a friendly Vampire.
raise_reaper: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raise as a friendly Reaper for 6 turns

name: Seal Fate
description: After 4 turns, deal 160 dark damage to target unit.

requires_los: Seal Fate can be cast without line of sight
spreads: When Sealed Fate's duration expires, it jumps to a random enemy in line of sight.

name: Wheel of Death
description: Deal 200 dark damage to a random enemy unit.

cascade:
On kill, gain a Roulette stack for 10 turns.
Wheel of death hits an additional enemy for each Roulette stack you have at cast time.

name: Volcanic Eruption
description:
Create a 6 tile burst of lava in a chasm.
The burst flows up to 3 tiles out of the chasm.
The lava deals 46 fire damage

requires_los: Volcano can be cast without line of sight
wall_cast: In addition to chasms, volcano may target walls.  Doing so turns the walls into chasms

name: Underworld Passage
description:
Teleport to any tile adjacent to a chasm.
Can only be cast while adjacent to a chasm.

name: Earthen Sentinel
description:
Summon an Earth Elemental.
Earth elementals have 120 HP, 50 physical resist, 50 fire resist, 50 lightning resist, and cannot move.
Earth elementals have a melee attack which deals 20 physical.The elemental vanishes after 15 turns.

earthquake_totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Earthquake spell on a 3 turn cool down.
stinging_totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Poison Sting spell.
holy_totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Heavenly Blast spell on a 2 turn cool down.

name: Ghostball
description:
Deal 11 dark damage to enemy units in a 1 tile radius.
Summon ghosts at empty tiles in the radius.
Ghosts have 4 HP, fly, 100 physical resist, 50 dark resist, and passively blink.
Ghosts have a melee attack which deals 1 dark damage.
The ghosts vanish after 14 turns.

king: A Ghost King is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.
mass: A Ghostly Mass is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.

name: Mystic Memory
description: Regain all charges of a random other spell which currently has no remaining charges.

name: Conjure Memories
description: Regain a charge of each of your conjuration spells

name: Permenance
description:
Your spells and temporary summons last an extra 5 turns.
This effect lasts 20 turns.

name: Death Gaze
description: Each allied unit deals 4 dark damage to a random enemy in its line of sight.

vampiric: Each allied unit heals for 100% of the damage it causes

name: Magic Missile
description: Deal 11 arcane damage to the target.

shield_burn: Magic Missile removes up to 3 SH from the target before dealing damage.
slaughter: If Magic Missile targets a [living] unit, it deals [poison], [dark], and [physical] damage instead of [arcane].
holy: If Magic Missile targets an [undead] unit, it deals [holy] damage in addition to [arcane] damage.
disruption: If Magic Missile targets an [arcane] unit, it deals [dark] and [holy] damage instead of [arcane].

name: Devour Mind
description:
Deal 25 arcane to an enemy unit.
Then, if the target is under 50%% HP, deal it an additional 25 dark damage.
Can only target living units.

gluttony: If Devour Mind kills the target, the charge cost is refunded

name: Death Shock
description:
Deal 17 lightning damage and 17 dark damage to the target.
If the target is slain, this effect bounces to a random enemy in line of sight up to 4 tiles away.
Can hit up to 3 targets.

infinite_bounces: There is no limit to the number of targets Death Shock can cascade to

name: Melt
description: Target unit takes 22 fire damage and loses 100 physical resist.

name: Dragon Roar
description:
All allied dragons gain 25 max HP, 12 melee attack damage, and 1 turn cooldown reduction.
Lasts 25 turns.

name: Protect Minions
description:
All allied units gain 50 physical resist, 50 fire resist, and 50 lightning resist.
Lasts 10 turns.

name: Word of Chaos
description:
Stun each enemy for 6 turns and teleport them to random tiles.
Deal 45 lightning damage to all fire enemies.
Deal 45 fire damage to all lightning enemies.
Each enemy construct loses all physical resist and takes 45 physical damage.

name: Word of Undeath
description:
All undead units have their current and maximum HP doubled.
All other units except the caster lose half their current and maximum HP.

name: Word of Beauty
description:
Heal yourself and all living units fully.
Deal 25 lightning damage to demon and undead units.
Stun all arcane units for 7 turns.

name: Floating Eye
description:
Summon a floating eye.
Floating eyes have 1 HP, 4 SH, float in place, and passively blink.
Floating eyes have no attacks of their own, but will cast any other eye spells you know upon being summoned.
Floating eyes vanish after 16 turns.

name: Eye of Rage
description:
Every 3 turns, inflict berserk on a random enemy unit in line of sight for 2 turns.
Lasts 20 turns.

lycanthrophy: When Eye of Rage targets a [living] unit with 25 or less HP, that unit is instantly killed and raised as friendly Werewolf.  That Werewolf is berserked for 14 turns.

name: Chimera Familiar
description:
Summon a Chimera Familiar.
The chimera has 6 fire damage and 6 lightning damage attacks with a range of 4 tiles.
The chimera mimics your casts of fire or lightning or chaos sorcery spells if the target is in range and line of sight.

nature_casting: The Chimera will mimic nature sorcery spells as well
dark_casting: The Chimera will mimic dark sorcery spells as well
arcane_casting: The Chimera will mimic arcane sorcery spells as well

name: Arc Lightning
description:
Lightning arcs to 3 enemies visible from the target tile.
Each arc deals 16 lightning damage to units in a beam.

cascade: Secondary flashes dealing half damage and stunning for half duration are triggered at each initial arc target.

name: Fan of Flames
description:
Deal 9 fire damage to all units in a cone.
This spell can be channeled for up to 10 turns.  The effect is repeated each turn the spell is channeled.

name: Poison Sting
description:
Deal 9 physical damage to target unit.
That unit is poisoned for 30 turns.
Poisoned units take 1 poison damage each turn.

antigen: Damaged targets lose all poison resist

name: Blue Lion
description:
Summon a blue lion.
Blue lions have 28 HP, fly, have 50 arcane resist and 50 physical resist.
Blue lions have a spell that grants 1 SH to themselves and allies in their line of sight, up to a maximum of 2 SH with a cooldown of 3 turns.
Blue lions also have a melee attack which deals 7 physical damage.

holy_bolt: The Blue Lion's melee attack is replaced by a range 6 holy bolt attack.

name: Death Cleave
description:
Whenever a spell you cast kills its primary target, that spell is recast on a randomly selected nearby valid enemy target up to 4 tiles away.
This process repeats until the target survives the spell, or there are no nearby valid targets.
Lasts 2 turns.

name: Multicast
description:
Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy it.
Lasts 3 turns

name: Fae Court
description:
Summons a group of 5 faeries near the caster.
The faeries fly, and have 9 HP, 1 SH, 75 arcane resistance, and a passive blink.
The faeries can heal allies for 5 HP, with a range of 4 tiles.
The faeries have a 4 arcane damage attack, with a range of 4 tiles.
The faeries vanish after 15 turns.

summon_queen: A fae queen is summoned as well
glass_fae: Summon glass faeries instead of normal ones.

name: Ring of Spiders
description:
Summons a ring of giant spiders at the target, surrounded by a ring of webs.
Units blocking the spider ring are poisoned for 10 turns, creatures blocking the web ring are stunned for 1 turn.
Giant spiders have 14 HP and spin webs.
Giant spiders have a melee attack which deals 2 physical and inflicts 5 turns of poison.
Webs stun non spider units which step on them for 1 turn.
Poisoned units take 1 poison damage each turn.Stunned units cannot act.

name: Word of Madness
description:
Berserk all units except the caster for 5 turns.
Deal dark damage to all construct units equal to half their current HP.
Fully heal all demon units.

name: Heavenly Blast
description: Deal 7 holy damage to enemies and heal allies for 7 hp along a beam and in a 1 tile burst.

spiritbind: Slain enemies create temporary spirits.  Spirits are blinking holy undead with 4 hitpoints and a 2 damage ranged holy attack.
shield: Affected ally units gain 2 SH, to a maximum of 5.
echo_heal: Affected ally units are re-healed for half the initial amount each turn for 5 turns.

name: Holy Fire
description:
Deal 22 fire damage in a vertical line and 22 holy damage in a horizontal line.
Stun demon and undead units in the affected area.

name: Choir of Angels
description:
Summons a choir of 3 angelic singers.
The singers have 10 HP, 1 SH, 50% resistance to fire and holy damage, and 100% resistance to dark damage.
The angels can sing, dealing 2 fire and 2 holy damage to all undead, demon, and dark units in a 5 tile radius. Living and holy units in the song's radius are healed for 1 HP.
The angels vanish after 10 turns.

name: Heaven's Wrath
description:
Deal 22 lightning damage and 22 holy damage to 3 units with the highest current HP.
Does not target friendly units or gates.

culling: Heaven's Wrath also damages the units with the lowest current HP.

name: Suspend Mortality
description: Target allied unit gains the ability to reincarnate on death for 40 turns.

name: Soul Tax
description:
Deal damage to target unit equal to one third of its health as holy damage, and then one third of its remaining health as dark damage.
Heal the caster for the total amount of damage dealt.

arcane: Soul tax deals an additional third of the target's remaining HP as arcane damage.

name: Holy Armor
description:
Gain 50 physical resist.
Gain 50 fire resist.
Gain 50 lightning resist.
Gain 50 dark resist.
Lasts 9 turns.

name: Blinding Light
description:
Blind all units in line of sight of the caster for 4 turns.
Blind units have all their spell ranges reduced to 1.Deals 5 holy damage to affected undead and demon units.

dark_units: Dark units also take holy damage.

name: Flock of Eagles
description:
Summons 4 eagles near the caster.
Eagles have 18 HP and can fly.
Eagles have a melee attack which deals 6 physical damage.

dive_attack: Grants the eagles a dive attack
thunderbirds: Summon thunderbirds instead of eagles.  Thunderbirds deal and resist [lightning] damage.

name: Heavenly Idol
description:
Summon an Idol of Beauty.
The idol has 35 HP, 2 SH, and is stationary.
The idol has  a passive aura which affects all units in line of sight of the idol.Affected allies are healed for for 1 HP.
Affected enemies take 1 holy damage.
Affected undead and demon units take an additional 1 lightning damage.
The idol vanishes after 15 turns.

fire_gaze: The Idol gains a fire beam attack

name: Gold Drake
description:
Summon a Gold Drake.
Gold drakes have 45 HP, 100 holy resist, and can fly.
Gold drakes have a breath weapon which deals 9 holy damage to enemies and heals allies for 9 HP.
Gold drakes have a melee attack which deals 8 physical damage

dragon_mage:
Summoned Gold Drakes can cast Healing Light with a 15 turn cooldown.
This Healing Light gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Call Seraph
description:
Summon a seraph.
Seraphim have 33 HP, 3 SH, and can fly.
Seraphim have a cleaving melee attack which deals 14 fire and 14 holy damage.
The seraph vanishes after 14 turns.

moonblade: The Seraph deals arcane damage in addition to fire and holy damage with its cleave attack.
essence: The Seraph increases the duration of all temporary allies within 5 tiles by 1 each turn.
heal: The Seraph heals all your other minions allies within 5 tiles for 5 HP each turn.
holy_fire: The Seraph gains a damage aura, randomly dealing either [2_fire:fire] or [2_holy:holy] damage to enemies within 5 tiles each turn.

name: Call Archon
description:
Summon an Archon.
Archons have 77 HP, 3 SH, and can fly.
Archons have beam attacks which deal 14 lightning damage to enemies and shield allies.
The Archon vanishes after 14 turns.

name: Pain Mirror
description:
Whenever you take damage, deal that much dark damage to all enemies in line of sight.
Lasts 10 turns.

name: Pyrostatic Pulse
description:
Deal 16 fire damage in a beam.
Deal 16 lightning damage to tiles adjacent to the beam.

name: Aether Swap
description:
Swap places with target unit.
That unit takes 16 arcane damage.
Cannot target arcane immune units.

requires_los: Aether Swap can be cast without line of sight

name: Siphon Shields
description: Steal up to 1 SH from all units in line of sight.

shield_burn: Deal 5 fire damage per shield stolen

name: Hungry Maw
description:
Summons a hungry maw.
The maw has 8 HP, 1 SH, floats, and is stationary.
The maw has a 9 physical damage attack, which pulls enemies towards it, with a range of 7 tiles.
The maw vanishes after 15 turns.

name: Darkness
description:
Each turn, blind all units for 1 turn.
Blind units have all their spell ranges reduced to 1.Demon and undead units are unaffected.
Lasts 5 turns

name: Hollow Flesh
description:
Curse a group of units with the essence of undeath.
Affected units become undead and lose living.
Affected units lose 25% of their max HP.
Affected units lose 100 holy resist.
Affected units gain 100 dark resist.
Affected units cannot be healed.

name: Cantrip Cascade
description: Cast each of your level 1 sorcery spells on each enemy in a cone.

name: Conductance
description:
Curse an enemy with the essence of conductivity.
That enemy loses 50 lightning resist.
Whenever you cast a lightning spell targeting that enemy, copy that spell.
Lasts 10 turns.

copies: Make 1 extra copy of lightning spells cast on the target

name: Invoke Savagery
description:
Each living ally attacks a random enemy unit in melee range.
The attack deals 14 physical damage and inflicts 2 turns of stun.

name: Meteor Shower
description:
Rains 7 meteors down on random tiles in a 7 tile radius each turn.
Meteors deal 23 physical damage, destroy walls, and inflict stun for 2 turns.
Meteors also deal 23 fire damage in a 2 tile radius.
This spell can be channeled for up to 5 turns.  The effect is repeated each turn the spell is channeled.

rock_size: Increase the physical damage and stun radius from 0 to 1

name: Shrapnel Blast
description:
Detonate target wall tile.
Enemies adjacent to the wall tile take 12 fire damage.
The explosion fires 16 shards at random tiles in a 4 tile burst.
Each shard deals 12 physical damage.

puncture: The shrapnel can penetrate or destroy walls
homing: The shrapnel shards always target enemies if possible.

name: Plague of Filth
description:
Summon a group of 2 toads and fly swarms.
Toads have 12 HP.
Toads have a ranged tongue attack which deals 2 physical damage and pulls enemies towards it.
Toads can hop up to 4 tiles away.
Fly swarms have 6 HP, 75 dark resist, 75 physical resist, -50 ice resist, and can fly.
Fly swarms have a melee attack which deals 1 physical damage.
The summons vanish after 7 turns.
This spell can be channeled for up to 15 turns.

snakes: Plague of Filth has a 50% chance of summoning a snake instead of a fly swarm or frog.  Snakes have 3/4 the health of toads, deal 1 more damage.  Snakes apply 5 stacks of poison on hit.

name: Searing Orb
description:
Summon a searing orb next to the caster.
The orb deals 3 fire damage each turn to all units in line of sight.
The caster is immune to this damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by ice damage.

melt_walls: Searing Orb can melt and be cast through walls

name: Ball Lightning
description:
Summon a lighting orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb fires 3 beams of electricity at random enemy units in line of sight. The beams deal 6 lightning damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by lightning damage.

orb_walk: Targeting an existing lightning orb causes it to emit a magnetic pulse that pulls [construct] and [lightning] units in line of sight 3 tiles towards the orb.

name: Orb Control
description: Retarget all allied orbs to target tile.

name: Glass Orb
description:
Summon a glass orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb inflicts glassify on enemy units in a 3 tile area.
Glassified units cannot act.
Glassified units gain -100 physical resist.
Glassified units gain 100 ice resist.
Glassified units gain 100 lightning resist.
Glassified units gain 75 fire resist.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by physical damage.

shield: The orb shields minions (1 shield, up to a max of 3) in the radius.

name: Fiery Tormentor
description:
Summon a fiery tormentor.
The tormentor has 34 HP.
The tormentor has a burst attack dealing 7 fire damage with a 4 tile radius.
The tormentor has a lifesteal attack dealing 2 dark damage with a 2 tile range.
The tormentor vanishes after 50 turns.

name: Petrification Aura
description:
Each turn, inflict petrify on up to 3 unpetrified enemy units in a 7 tile radius each turn.
Petrified units cannot act.
Petrified units gain 100 ice resist.
Petrified units gain 100 lightning resist.
Petrified units gain 75 physical resist.
Petrified units gain 75 fire resist.Lasts 7 turns.

glassify: Turn enemies to glass instead of stone, makeing them take double physical damage instead of one quarter.

name: Dispersion Field
description:
Each turn, teleport 3 enemies in a 6 tile radius to random locations on the map.
Lasts 7 turns.

name: Knightly Oath
description:
Summon a void knight, a chaos knight, and a storm knight.
Each knight has 90 HP, various resistances, and an arsenal of unique magical abilities.
The caster takes 40 holy damage whenever a knight dies.

void_court: Summon only void knights.  Summon a void champion as well.
storm_court: Summon only storm knights.  Summon a storm champion as well.
chaos_court: Summon only chaos knights.  Summon a chaos champion as well.

name: Toxin Burst
description:
Deal 1 poison damage and inflict poison on all units in a 4 tile radius for 20 turns.
Poisoned units take 1 poison damage each turn.

name: Toxic Spores
description:
Summons 2 mushbooms.
Mushbooms have 11 HP.
Mushbooms have a ranged attack dealing 1 poison damage and inflicting 4 turns of poison.
Mushbooms inflict 12 turns of poison on units in melee range when they die.

grey_mushboom: Summon grey mushbooms instead, which apply stun instead of poison.
red_mushboom: Summon red mushbooms instead, which do not apply poison but deal fire damage
glass_mushboom: Summon glass mushbooms instead, which apply glassify instead of poison

name: Amplify Venom
description: All poisoned enemies lose 100 poison resist for 10 turns.

spread: Amplify Poison spreads poison to nearby enemies (radius 2)

name: Combust Poison
description:
Consume all poison on enemy units.
Deal fire damage in an 2 tile burst around each affected enemy equal to 1x the amount of poison consumed.

name: Spider Queen
description:
Summon a spider queen.
The spider queen has 96 HP.
The spider queen hatches 4 baby spiders every 12 turns.
Baby spiders have 3 HP and cannot attack, but they mature into giant spiders after 8 turns which have 14 HP.
Giant spiders and the spider queen have melee attacks which deal 2 physical physical damage and inflicts 10 turns of poison.

aether: Summon an aether spider queen instead.
steel: Summon a steel spider queen instead.

name: Freeze
description:
Target unit is frozen for 5 turns.
Frozen units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking fire or physical damage.

name: Iceball
description:
Deals 14 ice damage in a 2 tile burst.
Damaged units are frozen for 3 turns.

icecrush: Units inside of the area of effect which are already frozen take physical damage before being refrozen.

name: Blizzard
description:
Create a blizzard with a 4 tile radius.
Each turn, units in the blizzard take 5 ice damage, and have a 50% chance to be frozen.
Frozen units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking fire or physical damage.The blizzard lasts 5 turns.

requires_los: Blizzard can be cast without line of sight

name: Frostfire Hydra
description:
Summon a frostfire hydra.
The hydra has 16 HP, and is stationary.
The hydra has a beam attack which deals 7 fire damage with a 9 tile range.
The hydra has a beam attack which deals 7 ice damage with a 9 tile range.
The hydra vanishes after 15 turns.

name: Storm Burst
description:
Unleashes a 5 tile burst of storm energy.
Each tile in the burst takes either 21 ice damage or 21 lightning damage.
Units dealt ice damage are frozen for 3 turns.
Units dealt lightning damage are stunned for 3 turns.

clouds: The nova leaves storm clouds and blizzards behind

name: Death Chill
description:
Deal 11 dark damage to the target each turn for 5 turns.
If the target dies during this time, deals 11 ice damage and inflicts frozen for 5 turns on all enemies within a 3 tiles radius.
Frozen units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking fire or physical damage.

name: Ice Phoenix
description:
Summon an ice phoenix.
The phoenix has 74 HP, flies, and reincarnates once upon death.
The phoenix has a ranged attack which deals 9 ice damage with a 4 tile range.
When the phoenix dies, it explodes in a 6 tile burst, dealing 25 ice damage to enemies and granting 2 SH to allies.

lives: The phoenix will reincarnate 2 more times

name: Word of Ice
description:
All non ice immune enemies under 50 HP are frozen for 5 turns.
Deals 50 ice damage to all fire units.

name: Ice Orb
description:
Summon an ice orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb deals 7 ice damage to enemy units in a 3 tile radius.
Frozen units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking fire or physical damage.The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by fire damage.

freeze_chance: The orb has a 50% chance to freeze damaged targets for 1 turn

name: Icicle
description:
Deal 6 physical damage to the target.
Then, deal 6 ice to the target and a 1 tile area around it.

freezing: Freeze the main target for 2 turns

name: Chill Wind
description: Deals 21 ice damage and inflicts 6 turns of frozen on units in a 3 tile wide line perpendicular to the caster.

name: Wall of Ice
description:
Summons a line of ice elementals with a length of 3 tiles.
Ice elementals have 36 HP, 50 physical resist, 100 ice resist, -100 fire resist, and cannot move.
Ice elementals have a ranged attack which deals 5 ice damage at a range of up to 3 tiles.
The elementals vanish after 15 turns.

name: Bone Barrage
description:
Your summoned allies in line of sight of the target take physical damage equal to half their health.
Each affected ally deals that much physical damage to the target.

beam: Bone Barrage damages all targets in a beam from the minion to the target
dark: Bone Barrage also deals dark damage

name: Earthquake
description:
Invoke an earthquake with a 7 tile radius.
Each tile in the area has a 50% chance to be affected.
Units on affected tiles take 21 physical physical damage.
Walls on affected tiles are destroyed.

safety: Earthquake will not damage friendly units

name: Searing Seal
description:
Gain Seal of Searing.
Whenever an enemy takes fire damage, the seal gains that many charges.
When the seal expires, it deals 1 fire damage to all enemies in line of sight for every 4 charges it has.
The seal lasts 6 turns.
Recasting the spell will expire the current seal and create a new one.

name: Soul Swap
description: Swap places with a friendly undead unit.

forced_transfer: Soul Swap can target enemy undead units as well.

name: Purity
description:
Lose all debuffs.
You cannot gain new debuffs.
Lasts 6 turns.

name: Twilight Gaze
description:
All enemies in line of sight lose 50 dark resist and 50 holy resist.
Lasts 10 turns.

name: Slime Form
description:
Assume slime form for 8 turns.
Gain 50 physical resist while in slime form.
Gain 100 poison resist while in slime form.
Summon a friendly slime each turn while in slime form.
Slimes have 10 HP, have a 50% chance each turn to gain 1 max HP, and split into two slimes upon reaching twice their starting HP.
Slimes have a melee attack which deals 3 poison damage.

fire_slimes: Gain an equal chance to summon fire slime.
ice_slimes: Gain an equal chance to summon ice slime.
void_slimes: Gain an equal chance to summon void slime.

name: Blazerip
description:
Deals 12 arcane and 12 fire damage in a 7 tile line perpendicular to the caster.
Melts walls in the affected area.

name: Ice Vortex
description:
Must target a frozen unit.
All enemy units in a 5 tile radius are pulled towards that unit, frozen for 2 turns, and dealt 11 arcane and 11 ice damage.

name: The Restless Dead
description:
Whenever a living enemy dies, raise it as a skeleton.
Raised skeletons have max HP equal to that of the slain unit, and deal 5 physical damage in melee.
Skeletons of flying units can fly.
This effect lasts 15 turns.

salvage: Whenever an enemy constructs dies, raise it as a junk golem.
spirit_catcher: Whenever an enemy fire, ice or lightning unit dies, a random summoned ally gains 100 resistance to that element and a ranged attack of that type.  Each ally can gain only 1 such buff.

name: Pyrostatic Curse
description:
Curses targets in a 4 tile radius for 4 turns.
Whenever a cursed target takes fire damage, 2 random enemy units in line of sight of that unit are dealt half that much lightning damage.

beam: Redealt lightning damage is dealt along a beam instead of just to one target.
